contentList.content: Inevitable Advance

Spend an action to gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_INEVITABLE_ADVANCE">Inevitable Advance</LSTag> for 10 turns, allowing you to ignore <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> and the enemy's attempts to move you.
You cannot be forcibly moved by a foe's spells or actions, and you ignore the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Ignore <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> and attempts to forcibly move you.
Spell Purge
You gain the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DispelEvilAndGood_BreakEnchantment">Dispel Evil and Good: Break Enchantment</LSTag>.
Unshrouded Eyes
Spend a spellbane die to see normally in both magical and non-magical darkness, become immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>, and see through certain magical illusions.

You can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of [1], and you can't be Blinded. In addition, you can see through illusions and are unaffected by spells that would deceive your eyes.

You are unaffected by Hypnotic Pattern, Phantasmal Force, Phantasmal Killer, and Fear, and your attacks ignore the effects of Mirror Image and Blur.
Spellbreaker

Spellbreakers stand as steadfast guardians against the arcane, channeling the power of their unique abilities to suppress and counteract magic. They wield both sword and purpose with unwavering conviction.
Spellbane Die
Spellbane dice are spent to empower Spellbreaker abilities, improving anti-magic capabilities in combat.
Spellbane Dice: [3]

Your Spellbane Dice are d8s. You have [3]. At Fighter level 7, these dice are rolled as 2d4. They fuel your Spellbreaker abilities and are expended upon use. You regain expended Spellbane Dice after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You gain 2 more <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellbaneDie">Spellbane Dice</LSTag>.
Disciplines

Disciplines are powerful abilities that use Spellbane Dice.

Your Discipline save DC is equal to 10 + your Constitution or Wisdom modifier, whichever is higher.
Spell Parry

When an enemy hits you with a spell, reduce the damage by [1] as a reaction.

If the damage was magical - not bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing - your next attack deals an additional [1] of the blocked damage type.
Annulling Strike
Your attack deals extra Force damage and disrupts your target's connection to the Weave, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_ANNULMENT_ANTIMAGIC">spell blocking</LSTag> them.

Spend a spellbane die to deal an additional [1] and break the target's <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>. On a hit, the target must also succeed on a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_ANNULMENT_ANTIMAGIC">Spell Blocked</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Does not spend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellbaneDie">spellbane die</LSTag>.
Rite of Annulment
You learn how to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Spellbreaker_Shout_RiteOfAnnulment_NEW">Rite of Annulment</LSTag>.

For 3 turns, you project an antimagic field around yourself. Creatures within the area are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_ANNULMENT_ANTIMAGIC">Spell Blocked</LSTag>, have advantage on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells, and are <LSTag Tooltip="Immunity">Immune</LSTag> to damage from spells.

While it remains in the aura, the creature is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_ANNULMENT_ANTIMAGIC">Spell Blocked</LSTag>, has advantage on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells, and is <LSTag Tooltip="Immunity">Immune</LSTag> to damage from spells.
Spell Blocked
A Spellbreaker has severed the entity's connection to magic, preventing it from casting spells.
Spellbreaker's Counterspell

Make a creature fail when it casts a spell. Spells of level 1 or lower can always be interrupted. Higher level spells are harder and require a Constitution Check against a DC of 12 + the spell's level.

Successfully nullifying a spell has a 50% chance to apply Spell Block to the caster for 1 turn.
Spend a spellbane die to give an ally a +[1] bonus on an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against a spell.
Practiced Doctrine
Spend a spellbane die to gain a +[1] bonus on your next Arcana or Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag>.
The affected entity has a +[1] on its next Arcana or Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag>.
Mental Fortress
When you make an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against a spell, you can spend a spellbane die to add +[1] to the roll.
Cleanse Magic
Gain the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Templar_Target_RemoveCurse">Remove Curse</LSTag> with a spellbane die.
Improved Spellbane
The size of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellbaneDie">Spellbane Dice</LSTag> increases to 1d6.
Antimagic Communion
Regain one expended <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellbaneDie">Spellbane Dice</LSTag> once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Weave Rend
Spend an action to tear at the weave itself, unleashing a shockwave that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_ANNULMENT_ANTIMAGIC">Spell Blocks</LSTag> all in its path.

Brandish your weapon to tear open the Weave itself and unleash a shockwave of energy that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_ANNULMENT_ANTIMAGIC">Spell Blocks</LSTag> all creatures in its path for 2 turns.
Your weapon burns with incredible heat and deals an additional [1]. This damage scales with the size of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellbaneDie">Spellbane dice</LSTag>.
The size of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellbaneDie">Spellbane Dice</LSTag> increases to 2d4.
Weaveburning Strike

Ignite your weapon with a spell-consuming blaze, dealing extra Fire damage and possibly inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_WEAVEBURN_CURSE">Weave Burn</LSTag> on the target, causing further damage whenever it casts a spell.
Deal an extra [1] and set alight your target's connection to the Weave: each time it casts a spell it receives [2] per spell level.
Weave Burn
Each time the creature casts a spell it receives [1] per spell level.
The creature received [1] for casting a level [2] spell while it has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPELLBREAKER_WEAVEBURN_CURSE">Weave Burn</LSTag>.
Antimagic Acolyte

You learn one Discipline from the Spellbreaker subclass and gain two <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellbaneDie">Spellbane Dice</LSTag> to fuel it. You regain expended Spellbane Dice after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Spell Parry: Acid Damage
Spell Parry: Cold Damage
Spell Parry: Fire Damage
Spell Parry: Lightning Damage
Spell Parry: Thunder Damage
Spell Parry: Radiant Damage
Spell Parry: Necrotic Damage
Spell Parry: Psychic Damage
Spell Parry: Poison Damage
Spell Parry: Force Damage
The affected entity deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
Arcane Devourer

Make an attack that expends one of the target's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> and deals extra Force damage. You regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> equal to the Force damage dealt.

Your attack expends one of the target's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> and deals an additional [1]. You regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> equal to the Force damage dealt.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Arcana and Investigation.
